name: Treasure (moyuge)
description:
The natural resources generates over time.

Click to collect resources or attack enemy.

The resident will do whatever he what, if every resident died, game ends.

Above shows the resources available to use.

Scroll mouse wheel to switch building to craft.

Press R to restart when the game ends.

It's sad that basic GMS2 version can't publish HTML game, I'll probably try to use Godot later.

Sprites List:

https://pixelhole.itch.io/pixelholes-overworld-tileset

https://merchant-shade.itch.io/16x16-mini-world-sprites

GAME OVER GUI is from IWBTG
